name: API: Verify Advanced Project Options section is available
description: Verify that the user can access the Advanced Project Options section by navigating to the Configure page of a multi-configuration project.
descriptionHtml: Verify that the user can access the Advanced Project Options section by navigating to the Configure page of a multi-configuration project.

beforeStages.name: Set up config from context for test session.
Clear Jenkins data before each test run.

steps.name: Clean up Jenkins data.
Delete all existing jobs and views for the user session.
Extract Jenkins crumb token from HTML response.

parameters.name: config
parameters.value: Config(browser=BrowserConfig(NAME='chrome', OPTIONS_CHROME='--remote-allow-origins=*;--disable-gpu;--no-sandbox;--disable-dev-shm-usage;--headless=new;--window-size=1920,1080', OPTIONS_EDGE='--window-size=1920,1080'), jenkins=JenkinsConfig(HOST='localhost', PORT='8080', USERNAME='admin', PASSWORD='e322e7761c10457ebc1f72a3431a133a', base_url='http://localhost:8080', login_url='http://localhost:8080/j_spring_security_check', login_data={'j_username': 'admin', 'j_password': 'e322e7761c10457ebc1f72a3431a133a'}, crumb='', current_username=''))

steps.name: Generate a new Jenkins API token for the current user.

POST to generate new token: api-token

steps.name: POST /createItem

Fetch and update Jenkins CSRF crumb token.
Create requests session using Selenium WebDriver cookies.

testStage.description: Verify that the user can access the Advanced Project Options section by navigating to the Configure page of a multi-configuration project.

steps.name: Go to the Multiconfig project page by clicking project link.
Go to Configure page
Go to Configure page of project "MyProject"
Get Advanced Project Options section
Wait for the element to be visible
Scroll to element
Assert Advanced Project Options section is displayed
